name: Lightwall
description:
Use the power of the light dimension to help the little lad get home.

If you get caught by the Lightwall on the left side of the screen, you'll be teleported back to the start.

Left and right arrow keys to Move.

Space bar to Jump.

Down arrow to switch dimensions.

Escape to start the game.

Team 4 - Lightwall

Contact Email - zoe.cushman@protonmail.com

Programming - Kavin, GT, Cooper

Art - Aicha

Audio and Level Design - Zoe

Made with the Unity 2D Platformer Template.
